name: latex-shortcut

0.3.0.name: lateX-shortcut
0.3.0.description: A collection of shortcuts to regularly used syntax from lateX.

0.2.0.name: lateX-shortcut
0.2.0.description: A collection of shortcuts to regularly used syntax from lateX.

readme:
# lateX-shortcut package

Currently implemented shortcuts:
  ctrl-shift-e: \emph{}
  crtl-shift-b: \textbf{}

Available in the menu:
  bold,
  emphasize,
  no indent

Every shortcut will put the selected text between the {}.

![A screenshot of your package](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/69169/2290250/c35d867a-a017-11e3-86be-cd7c5bf3ff9b.gif)
